body_html:
What's needed is a fix to "compatibility" section of the docs, there a difference in order and transposition from numpy result, whereas docs only mentions order difference

@compatibility(numpy)
  Mostly equivalent to numpy.linalg.svd, except that the order of output
  arguments here is `s`, `u`, `v` when `compute_uv` is `True`, as opposed to
  `u`, `s`, `v` for numpy.linalg.svd.
  @end_compatibility
body:
What's needed is a fix to "compatibility" section of the docs, there a difference in order and transposition from numpy result, whereas docs only mentions order difference

```
@compatibility(numpy)
  Mostly equivalent to numpy.linalg.svd, except that the order of output
  arguments here is `s`, `u`, `v` when `compute_uv` is `True`, as opposed to
  `u`, `s`, `v` for numpy.linalg.svd.
  @end_compatibility
```
